Database¶

database.js¶

class Database(constructor)¶

Represent database structure

Database.loadAllBlocks()¶

return blocklist

Database.loadCheckpoint(address)¶

return checkpoint

Database.readBlock(hash)¶

Gets hash value of a block from DB, and Returns Promise object,

Arguments:
  • hash (String) –
Database.readState(address)¶

Gets a State Object, Returns Promise objects from DB

Arguments:
  • address (String) –
Database.readTx(hash)¶

Gets hash value of tx, Returns Promise objects from DB

Arguments:
  • hash (String) –
Database.writeBlock(block)¶

Get a Block object and write it on DB, Returns Promise object

Arguments:
  • block (Block) –
Database.writeCheckpoint(checkpoint, account)¶

for update checkpoint

Arguments:
  • checkpoint (*) –
  • account (Number) –
Database.writeState(state)¶

Get a State object and update it on DB, Returns Promise an object.

Arguments:
  • state (Object) –
Database.writeTx(tx)¶

Get a Transaction object and write it on DB, Returns Promise an object.

Arguments:
  • tx (Transaction) –
